name: The Story of a DragonWolf
description:
The Story of a DragonWolf

In a beautiful world there once lived a lot of dragonwolves. This creatures made some great buildings and helped a lot of other creatures that had problems. And they liked to learn a lot of other creatures. Because dragonwolves are intelligence, skilled creatures that likes to solve puzzles and are always in for making a joke. For many years they lived happily together and in peace. Until one day a strange mysterious dark person visited their place and destroy every single building and cast a spell so that every dragonwolf was changed into a piece of puzzle. 

But one special dragonwolf survived this horror and the spell did something really strange with this one. He didn’t transform into a piece of puzzle but instead a weird device was created. And he can transform into a wolf or, in the other way, into a dragon, with each there unique ability. 
Can our special one solve all the puzzles and defeat the bosses to get his friends back that are transformed into puzzle pieces. So he can use those pieces to access the world of the mysterious dark person. And defeat him so there will be peace again. 

In this small game you have to solve a puzzle to shoot on some torchlight-enemies in the right order so you can collect a puzzle piece and get through the spike-gate.
